notes: USA-based manufacturer of Reishi in Glycerin 3336GL (Ganoderma Lucidum extract) for natural cosmetics. Available through UL Prospector and website. Applications: anti-aging serums, immune-supporting skincare, adaptogenic cosmetics. Glycerin base makes it ready for aqueous formulations. Mid-range pricing ($55-85/kg) with standard wholesale quantities. GMP certified with USA manufacturing and distribution. Technical data sheets and formulation support available. Ideal for formulators seeking ready-to-use adaptogen extracts.
